name: nl core address official
title: nl-core-address-official
description: Mark an address as an 'officially registered' address. In Dutch context that means it is registered in the Basisregistratie persoonsgegevens (BRP)

element.short: true if part of an official registry. false if it is not
element.definition: When the value is true, this address is marked to be part of an official registry (Dutch realm: BRP). When the value is false, this address is explicitly marked as not part of an official registry.
alias: true als deze deel is van een officieel register. false indien dat niet het geval is
element.meaningWhenMissing: When an address is not marked explicitly as official=true|false then no information can be inferred from that.
